box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center; max-height: 4153px; overflow: hidden;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

p.style: font-size: 11px; text-align: left; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

span.style: caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: start;

div.span: Azure ExpressRoute lets you extend your on-premises networks into the Microsoft cloud over a private connection, with the help of a connectivity provider. This connection is called an ExpressRoute Circuit. With ExpressRoute, you can establish connections to Microsoft cloud services, such as Microsoft Azure and Microsoft 365. This feature allows you to connect offices, datacenters, or other facilities to the Microsoft cloud. Each location would have its own ExpressRoute circuit.

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Connectivity can be from an any-to-any (IP VPN) network, a point-to-point Ethernet network, or a virtual cross-connection through a connectivity provider at a colocation facility. ExpressRoute connections don't go over the public Internet. This setup allows ExpressRoute connections to offer more reliability, faster speeds, consistent latencies, and higher security than typical connections over the Internet.

h2.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 32px 0px 12px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.59375rem, 18.7895px + 1.39803vw, 2.125rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: There are several benefits to using ExpressRoute as the connection service between Azure and on-premises networks.

ul.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 16px 0px 16px 38px; padding: 0px; list-style: none; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Connectivity to Microsoft cloud services across all regions in the geopolitical region.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Global connectivity to Microsoft services across all regions with the ExpressRoute Global Reach.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Dynamic routing between your network and Microsoft via Border Gateway Protocol (BGP).

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Built-in redundancy in every peering location for higher reliability.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: ExpressRoute enables direct access to the following services in all regions:

ul.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 16px 0px 16px 38px; padding: 0px; list-style: none; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Microsoft Office 365

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Microsoft Dynamics 365

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Azure compute services, such as Azure Virtual Machines

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Azure cloud services, such as Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Storage

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: You can enable ExpressRoute Global Reach to exchange data across your on-premises sites by connecting your ExpressRoute circuits. For example, say you had an office in Asia and a datacenter in Europe, both with ExpressRoute circuits connecting them to the Microsoft network. You could use ExpressRoute Global Reach to connect those two facilities, allowing them to communicate without transferring data over the public internet.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: ExpressRoute uses the BGP. BGP is used to exchange routes between on-premises networks and resources running in Azure. This protocol enables dynamic routing between your on-premises network and services running in the Microsoft cloud.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Each connectivity provider uses redundant devices to ensure that connections established with Microsoft are highly available. You can configure multiple circuits to complement this feature.

h2.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 32px 0px 12px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.59375rem, 18.7895px + 1.39803vw, 2.125rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: ExpressRoute supports four models that you can use to connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft cloud:

ul.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 16px 0px 16px 38px; padding: 0px; list-style: none; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: CloudExchange colocation

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Point-to-point Ethernet connection

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Any-to-any connection

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Directly from ExpressRoute sites

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Colocation refers to your datacenter, office, or other facility being physically colocated at a cloud exchange, such as an ISP. If your facility is colocated at a cloud exchange, you can request a virtual cross-connect to the Microsoft cloud.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Point-to-point ethernet connection refers to using a point-to-point connection to connect your facility to the Microsoft cloud.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: With any-to-any connectivity, you can integrate your wide area network (WAN) with Azure by providing connections to your offices and datacenters. Azure integrates with your WAN connection to provide a connection like you would have between your datacenter and any branch offices.

h3.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: You can connect directly into the Microsoft's global network at a peering location strategically distributed across the world. ExpressRoute Direct provides dual 100 Gbps or 10-Gbps connectivity, which supports Active/Active connectivity at scale.

h2.style: text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 32px 0px 12px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.59375rem, 18.7895px + 1.39803vw, 2.125rem); line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; text-align: start; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: With ExpressRoute, your data doesn't travel over the public internet, reducing the risks associated with internet communications. ExpressRoute is a private connection from your on-premises infrastructure to your Azure infrastructure. Even if you have an ExpressRoute connection, DNS queries, certificate revocation list checking, and Azure Content Delivery Network requests are still sent over the public internet.

div.p: Azure DNS

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: a hosting service for DNS domains that provides name resolution by using Microsoft Azure infrastructure. By hosting your domains in Azure, you can manage your DNS records using the same credentials, APIs, tools, and billing as your other Azure services.

h2.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 32px 0px 12px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.59375rem, 18.7895px + 1.39803vw, 2.125rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Azure DNS uses the scope and scale of Microsoft Azure to provide numerous benefits, including:

ul.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 16px 0px 16px 38px; padding: 0px; list-style: none; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Reliability and performance

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Security

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Ease of Use

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Customizable virtual networks

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Alias records

h3.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: DNS domains in Azure DNS are hosted on Azure's global network of DNS name servers, providing resiliency and high availability. Azure DNS uses anycast networking, so the closest available DNS server answers each DNS query, providing fast performance and high availability for your domain.

h3.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Azure DNS is based on Azure Resource Manager, which provides features such as:

ul.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 16px 0px 16px 38px; padding: 0px; list-style: none; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Azure role-based access control (Azure RBAC) to control who has access to specific actions for your organization.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Activity logs to monitor how a user in your organization modified a resource or to find an error when troubleshooting.

li.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline-style: none; outline-width: 0px; list-style: outside;

ul.li: Resource locking to lock a subscription, resource group, or resource. Locking prevents other users in your organization from accidentally deleting or modifying critical resources.

h3.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Azure DNS can manage DNS records for your Azure services and provide DNS for your external resources as well. Azure DNS is integrated in the Azure portal and uses the same credentials, support contract, and billing as your other Azure services.

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Because Azure DNS is running on Azure, it means you can manage your domains and records with the Azure portal, Azure PowerShell cmdlets, and the cross-platform Azure CLI. Applications that require automated DNS management can integrate with the service by using the REST API and SDKs.

h3.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.h3: Customizable virtual networks with private domains

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Azure DNS also supports private DNS domains. This feature allows you to use your own custom domain names in your private virtual networks, rather than being stuck with the Azure-provided names.

h3.style: font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 30px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; font-size: clamp(1.3125rem, 15.4737px + 1.15132vw, 1.75rem); font-weight: 600; line-height: 1.3; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; overflow-wrap: break-word; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

div.p: Azure DNS also supports alias record sets. You can use an alias record set to refer to an Azure resource, such as an Azure public IP address, an Azure Traffic Manager profile, or an Azure Content Delivery Network (CDN) endpoint. If the IP address of the underlying resource changes, the alias record set seamlessly updates itself during DNS resolution. The alias record set points to the service instance, and the service instance is associated with an IP address.

div.style: font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: var(--theme-text); background-color: var(--theme-primary-background); overflow-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-word; border: 1px solid var(--theme-primary-background-glow-high-contrast); border-radius: 0.375rem; margin-top: 1rem; padding: 1rem; transition: height 0.5s ease-in, opacity 0.5s ease-in; display: block; position: relative; caret-color: rgb(230, 230, 230); font-family: "Segoe UI", SegoeUI, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-weight: 600;

div.p: Important

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; outline-color: inherit; margin: 1rem 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; overflow-wrap: break-word;

div.p: You can't use Azure DNS to buy a domain name. For an annual fee, you can buy a domain name by using App Service domains or a third-party domain name registrar. Once purchased, your domains can be hosted in Azure DNS for record management.
